sourcesContent:
import { Component, EventEmitter, Output } from '@angular/core'; import { FormBuilder, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-edit-product', templateUrl: './edit-product.component.html', styleUrls: ['./edit-product.component.css'] }) export class EditProductComponent { constructor( private fb: FormBuilder ){} @Output() editProductModal = new EventEmitter(); editProductForm = this.fb.group({ name: ['', [Validators.required]], description: ['', [Validators.required]], }); get name(){ return this.editProductForm.get('name'); } get description() }

Edit Product
